addr: 7080 Hollywood Blvd. Suite 1100. los angeles, CA 90028
title: S.A.L.T (Saddleback Advanced Leadership Training) - L.A.
desc: WHO CAN ATTEND? - If you have completed CLASS 301 Discovering my SHAPE for Ministry OR - If you serve in any ministry at any campus (the ?CORE?) WHAT IS S.A.L.T? ?I consider S.A.L.T. to be the most important meeting of our church family. It?s also the most motivating and fun. It?s my favorite Saddleback event.? - Pastor Rick WHY IS S.A.L.T. SO IMPORTANT? This two-hour rally includes... Advanced training on how to be a skilled leader by Pastor Rick - Insider information about the latest happening in our church family - Thrilling reports and testimonies from our campuses and ministries - Commissioning new 301 graduates into their ministries - Monthly awards and recognitions of volunteer leaders in our church - Heartfelt worship through music You?ll be encouraged, uplifted, inspired, and equipped to be a more skilled and effective leader. Dinner: Provided Parking: validated. Park in parking garage located in the alley behind our office building, take the catwalk that connect the 2nd floor of the garage to the back doors of our office. Take a ticket from the machine, and we will validate it before the end of our session.
